content.new: In this function, only  env cameras were set with the near & clip distances, while the base camera remain the old values. Despite wide angle camera rendering images only use the 6 env cameras, I think it's still necessary to initialize the clip distances
content.old: In this function, only  env cameras were set with the near & clip distances, while the base camera remain the old values. Despite wide angle camera rendering images only use the 6 env cameras, I think it's still necessary to initialize the clip distances

issue.title: A bug in SetClipDist() in rendering::WideAngleCamera
